00084 /* Type defintions __________________________________________________________ */
00085 typedef struct {                  // Counterpart candidate
00086   std::string id;                   // Unique identifier
00087   double      pos_eq_ra;            // Right Ascension (deg)
00088   double      pos_eq_dec;           // Declination (deg)
00089   double      pos_err_maj;          // Uncertainty ellipse major axis (deg)
00090   double      pos_err_min;          // Uncertainty ellipse minor axis (deg)
00091   double      pos_err_ang;          // Uncertainty ellipse positron angle (deg)
00092   double      prob;                 // Counterpart probability
00093   //
00094   long        index;                // Index of CCs in CPT catalogue
00095   double      angsep;               // Angular separation of CCs from source
00096   double      prob_angsep;          // Probability from angular separation
00097 } CCElement;
00098 
00099 typedef struct {                  // Catalogue location information
00100   double      ra;                   // Right Ascension (deg)
00101   double      dec;                  // Declination (deg)
00102 } ObjectInfo;
